title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks.

title: Book Lending App
description: A desktop PyQT6 GUI app so that you can keep track of your books: it keeps record of your borrowed and returned books.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Topical News Site
description: A program that gets data from a news API and sends email when there is an update on a certain topic.

title: Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: Book Analyzer
description: A script that analyzes a text file: finding the most common words and most positive and negative chapters.

title: Tour Scraper
description: A program that checks a music band's website and sends an email when there are new tours.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and sends an email when a new object enters the view.

title: Visualizing Weather Forecast
description: A data web app that visualizes the weather forecast for the next five days of any city.

title: Student Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing university student data with an SQL database backend.

title: School Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing complex university data with an SQL database backend.
